This shows you can educate a donkey from Sri Lanka in prep schools in England by the father who robbed Sri Lanka quite well (money from Gamudawa and painting almost all the bridges along Galle road orange just so that his pocket was greased well --- list is long - no space here but please add murder to it too)-- but that person is still a donkey!!! 
5 years of power and nothing to show by this Sajith Premadasa. To top it all he has a spouse that calls herself "ariyawa". 


What kind of parasites we have as "leaders". These traitors not only sold the country during the last five years but is going to make Sri Lanka in to a slave country. Jadaplanya  and UNP traitors to the mother Lanka!
